heirloom.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a valuable object that has been owned by a family for many years and that is passed from the older members to the younger members
heirloom.translation[1].definitions[0].d: an heirloom vegetable or plant is one of a kind that was first grown many years ago, and has now become rare or unusual
heirloom.translation[1].definitions[0].e: They sell many kinds of heirloom seeds.
heirloom.translation[2].definitions[0].d: a valuable object that has been owned by a family for many years and that is passed, for example, from grandfather to father to son
heirloom.translation[2].definitions[0].e: The clock is a family heirloom.
